snippet: For the first show of its season, the Composer Portraits series at the Miller Theater devoted a program to Tobias Picker, providing an overview of his development.
lead_paragraph: For the first show of its season, the Composer Portraits series at the Miller Theater devoted a program to Tobias Picker, providing an overview of his development.

headline.main: A Composer’s Repertory in Broad Brush Strokes
headline.print_headline: A Composer’s Repertory In Broad Brush Strokes
headline.seo: Tobias Picker at the Miller Theater - Review
